tutors.name: Ahmed Khan
tutors.title: English Tutor
tutors.description: I'm Ahmed, a certified IB English tutor with 6 years of experience. My approach is to make critical analysis and essay writing easier and more enjoyable.

review.details: Ahmed transformed my approach to English! His teaching helped me boost my grades in the IB program, and I've become more confident in my writing. He really knows how to simplify difficult concepts and make learning enjoyable.

tutors.name: Sarah Al-Harbi
tutors.title: English Tutor
tutors.description: Hi! I'm Sarah, and I've been teaching English for over 8 years, focusing on IGCSE and SAT prep. I'm passionate about helping students excel in exams while also improving.

review.details: Sarah is an outstanding tutor! She helped me so much with my vocabulary and reading skills. I used to struggle with English, but her patient and interactive teaching style made all the difference. Thanks to her, I feel a lot more confident in school.

tutors.name: Hazem Farsi
tutors.title: English Tutor
tutors.description: Hello! I'm Hazem, and I've been teaching English for 10 years with a focus on KSA national curriculum students.

review.details: Hazem is an amazing tutor! He helped me raise my SAT score by over 200 points in just a few months. His lessons were always clear and enjoyable, and he gave me lots of useful tips on time management and test strategies. I highly recommend him to anyone looking to improve their English!
